name: Adam's Munchies
description:
Help Adam Apple reach a score of 100 by eating his favorite food...APPLES!!!.  But watch out for the oranges.

Score System:

Red Apple = 1  Point

Gold Apple = 2 Points

Orange =  -1 Points

Controls:

A Button("W" on Keyboard) - Munch Adam's Munchies can be played with an Xbox controller or the keyboard.

If you miss 3 Apples it is game over and you will have to replay the game(but only if you want to win and chow down).

This game took more then 2 weeks to complete, but I learned a lot from making this. Hopefully my next isn't about color coded objects and single button mashing.

All Sounds and Music I got are from Pixabay and Freesfx
